docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON- The millions of Americans who smoke cigarettes were offered another reason last week for kicking the habit.
docs.abstract: comment on recent PHS rept noting that cigarette smoking by pregnant women is hazardous to unborn babies
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON- The millions of Americans who smoke cigarettes were offered another reason last week for kicking the habit.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES

docs.lead_paragraph: A 37-year-old drug pusher is fatally struck by six bullets that shape a cross on his body. A bus is invaded and its driver held at gunpoint while passengers are relieved of wallets, watches and other valuables, Wild West style.

headline.main: Gangs Spread Terror in the South Bronx; A National Problem Police Link South Bronx Youth Gangs to Soaring Crime Emotional Sustenance Pacts and Alliances Made Turf Is Power Self-Defense a Motive Quitting Is Perilous Hundreds of Girls Join Some Words of Praise

docs.abstract: Part of NY Times series on street gangs in S Bronx, NYC, notes gangs of late '50s and early '60s disbanded after their members became heroin addicts and dropped out; finds gangs are credited for their harsh treatment of drug pushers, but that few are drug-free; finds some are used by drug dealers as armies to consolidate their power

docs.lead_paragraph: A 37-year-old drug pusher is Fatally struck by six bullets that shape a cross on his body. A bus is invaded and its driver held at gunpoint while passengers are relieved of wallets, watches and other valuables, Wild West style, A runaway girl is crippled after being beaten with belts and chains.
